lead_paragraph: PLAYER In Asia, Aleksandar Duric, a 37-year-old striker born in Bosnia, has been called to Singapore’s national team for its World Cup qualifying match against Tajikistan on Friday. Duric, a naturalized citizen, is the leading scorer in Singapore’s top league with 37 goals this season.
